member.name: M:Serilog.Formatting.Compact.EventIdHash.Compute(System.String)
member.summary: Compute a 32-bit hash of the provided . The resulting hash value can be uses as an event id in lieu of transmitting the full template string.

member.name: T:Serilog.Formatting.Compact.RenderedCompactJsonFormatter
member.summary: An that writes events in a compact JSON format, for consumption in environments without message template support. Message templates are rendered into text and a hashed event id is included.
